channel.title: Linux - boot up help
channel.description:
hello im using a vps with linux now, prob is i cant even boot it up i looked at like ten tuts
i use the command grub, than the command boot, but it says kernel needs to be loaded i try using command kernel but it doesnt do anything any help is appreciated
